code:
flowchart TD
    Input[Input Image] --> Conv1[Convolutional Layer 1]
    Conv1 --> Act1[Activation ReLU]
    Act1 --> Pool1[Pooling Layer 1]
    Pool1 --> Conv2[Convolutional Layer 2]
    Conv2 --> Act2[Activation ReLU]
    Act2 --> Pool2[Pooling Layer 2]
    Pool2 --> FC[Fully Connected Layer]
    FC --> Softmax[Softmax Output]
    style Input fill:#e1f5fe,stroke:#3498db,stroke-width:2px
    style FC fill:#f8f9fa,stroke:#34495e,stroke-width:2px
    style Softmax fill:#f1f3f4,stroke:#34495e,stroke-width:2px
